= t_house_property_building.community_id WHERE t_house_property_community.id = #{communityId} AND t_house_asset.asset_type = 1 AND t_house_asset.asset_flag = 0 UNION All -- 平房数 SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_property_building.community_id WHERE t_house_property_community.id = #{communityId} AND t_house_asset.asset_type = 1 AND t_house_asset.asset_flag = 1 UNION All -- 复式数 SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_asset JOIN t_house_property_building on t_house_asset.building_id = t_house_property_building.id JOIN t_house_property_community on t_house_property_community.id = t_house_property_building.community_id WHERE t_house_property_community.id = #{communityId} AND t_house_asset.asset_type = 1 AND t_house_asset.asset_flag = 2 UNION All -- 楼栋数 SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_property_building WHERE t_house_property_building.community_id = #{communityId} UNION ALL -- 单元数 SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_property_community JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_community.id = t_house_property_building.community_id JOIN t_house_property_building_unit ON t_house_property_building_unit.building_id = t_house_property_building.id WHERE t_house_property_community.id = #{communityId} UNION ALL -- 户型数 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_property_community JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_community.id = #{communityId} GROUP BY t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id) as t UNION ALL -- 换房需求数 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_house_asset_exchange_request WHERE t_house_asset_exchange_request.asset_id IN (SELECT t_house_asset.id FROM t_house_asset JOIN t_house_property_building on t_house_asset.building_id = t_house_property_building.id JOIN t_house_property_community on t_house_property_community.id = t_house_property_building.community_id WHERE t_house_property_community.id = #{communityId}) UNION ALL -- 换房记录数 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_house_asset_match_log WHERE t_house_property_community on t_house_property_community.id = t_house_property_building.community_id WHERE t_house_property_community.id = #{communityId}) UNION All -- 停车位数 SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_property_building.community_id WHERE t_house_property_community.id = #{communityId} AND t_house_asset.asset_type = 2 UNION ALL -- 房东数 SELECT count(*) FROM (select * from t_end_user where type & 16 AND appid in(1,2)) AS t UNION all -- 供应商数 SELECT count(*) FROM (select * from t_end_user where type & 4 AND appid in(1,2)) AS t ) AS t

SELECT * FROM ( -- 房子数 SELECT count(*) AS houseNumber FROM t_house_asset WHERE t_house_asset.building_id = #{buildingId} UNION All -- 单元数 SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_property_building JOIN t_house_property_building_unit ON t_house_property_building_unit.building_id = t_house_property_building.id WHERE t_house_property_building.id = #{buildingId} UNION ALL -- 户型数 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_property_building JOIN t_house_property_building_unit ON t_house_property_building_unit.building_id = t_house_property_building.id WHERE t_house_property_building.id = #{buildingId} AND t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id) as t UNION ALL -- 以回迁数 SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_asset JOIN t_house_user_asset ON t_house_asset.id = t_house_user_asset.asset_id WHERE t_house_asset.building_id = #{buildingId} UNION ALL -- 复式数 SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_asset WHERE t_house_asset.building_id=#{buildingId} AND t_house_asset.asset_flag=2 ) AS t
